item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

Hi, How would i make a timer so that if a player dies a person cannot leave the area for 3 minutes?

I have looked on Google, MoparScape, R~S and R~L but have had no sucess, Help would be much appreciated…

I have managed to come up with this;

I declared this;

public long leaveTimer = 0;

Then to my leave area object i added this;

case 2609: if (System.currentTimeMillis() - leaveTimer >= 180000) //180000 = 180 seconds = 3 minutes sM("You have a penalty and cannot leave"); { else } leaveTimer = System.currentTimeMillis(); toX = 3222; toY = 3222; sM("You leave the bounty Hunter Crater"); break;

Thankyou

Thats all ive got so far, but i don’t know how to make it so when i kill someone who is not my target i get the penalty and cannot leave.
